title: To Jade Me

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Overwhelm (Night): Choose a player and two symptoms of anxiety to cause them to suffer from.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The symptoms of anxiety are as follows:
> - Night ability disabled.
> - Vote disabled.
> - Cannot talk or whisper during the day.
> - Defense set to Vulnerable.
> - All immunities removed.
> - Delayed attacks (e.g. poison, bleeding) take effect immediately.
- Anxiety symptoms will last for a number of day/night cycles equal to the highest number of consecutive nights they have used a night ability OR the highest number of consecutive days they have used a day ability (whichever one is greater), plus one. You learn how many nights your target's anxiety symptoms will last for.
- Anxiety symptoms will be cured if a player is given at least Powerful defense from another player.
- You may not cause the same anxiety symptom two nights in a row.
- All Unseen members are immune to anxiety.
- Roleblock and control immune.

desc:
Post 2025
Got used to waking up in darkness, heart all heavy and twisted
